ghosts.name: Spirit of Shadows
ghosts.dialogue: The darkness deepens with your each step, seeking any light or soul to put out.

ghosts.name: Evil Echo
ghosts.dialogue: A marching soldier appears, continuing a battle lost years ago. You, as it happens, look an awful lot like an enemy.

ghosts.name: Phantom
ghosts.dialogue: Distorted laughter surrounds you, heralding the arrival of a disfigured child intent on you sharing her fate.

ghosts.name: Witch
ghosts.dialogue: The air crackles with magic, your body choking up at the hostility eating at you with every breath.

ghosts.name: Demon
ghosts.dialogue: A remnant of a pact unfulfilled, a goat-headed demon guards a tome. Its gaze burns your soul.
